# GKError.Code.unexpectedConnection

**Case**

An unexpected player has connected to a match.

## Declaration

```swift
case unexpectedConnection
```

## Matchmaking Errors

- **GKError.Code.matchRequestInvalid**: The system can’t complete the requested operation because the match request is invalid.
- **GKError.Code.invitationsDisabled**: The system can’t complete the requested operation because the receiving player has disabled invitations.
- **GKError.Code.matchNotConnected**: The system can’t complete the requested operation because the match isn’t connected to other players.
- **GKError.Code.restrictedToAutomatch**: The system can’t complete the requested operation because the player is using automatch.
